identity.name: E1 - The Kinetic Gamer
identity.persona: Vibrant, high-energy, playful, and competitive. Avoids boring SaaS flatness.
principles: Gamification is not just badges; it's the feel of the button press.
Color is energy. Use it to drive urgency and excitement.
Motion conveys status. Leaderboards must feel alive.

layout.spacing: Relaxed. Use p-6, p-8, gap-6, gap-8.

grid_modes.quiz_play: max-w-md mx-auto flex flex-col h-screen justify-center p-4
grid_modes.leaderboard: max-w-4xl mx-auto flex flex-col gap-4 p-6

styles.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground font-bold py-4 px-8 rounded-full border-b-4 border-[#CC4800] hover:brightness-110 active:border-b-0 active:translate-y-1 transition-all
styles.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-full border-b-4 border-[#7000B8] hover:brightness-110 active:border-b-0 active:translate-y-1 transition-all
styles.ghost: bg-transparent hover:bg-white/5 text-white font-semibold py-2 px-4 rounded-lg

Card.default: bg-background-paper/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 rounded-2xl p-6 shadow-xl
Card.glass: bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 rounded-2xl p-6

Input.default: bg-black/20 border-2 border-white/10 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 text-lg focus:border-primary focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary/20 outline-none transition-all placeholder:text-white/30 text-white

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL_DEPENDENCY: yarn add framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge lucide-react sonner
THEME_STRATEGY: Use a 'Hybrid Theme'. Admin Panel is Light Mode (clean, readable). Quiz/Student View is Dark Mode (immersive, gaming). Force these classes on the respective wrapper divs.
LAYOUT_STRATEGY: The Quiz View MUST be mobile-optimized. Even on desktop, center the quiz card like a mobile app view (max-w-md).
ANIMATION_STRATEGY: Use framer-motion for the Leaderboard reordering. It is CRITICAL for the 'Live' feel.
Use the provided Google Fonts. Add the import to index.css immediately.
For the 'Join Quiz' page, use the 'background_main' image as a full-screen cover with a heavy dark overlay (bg-black/60) to ensure text readability.
The '3D Button' style defined in visual_enhancers is mandatory for the Quiz Answer buttons. It gives tactile feedback.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attributes.
